initialHome.title: I'm
initialHome.description: I'm 22 years old and I work as a Frontend Developer from Argentina.

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.subtitle: My name is Joaquin Galdeano, I'm 22 years old and I'm from Resistencia, Chaco, Argentina.
about.description1: I started programming in 2021, starting with HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Creating small projects.
about.description2: In 2022 I got my first job as a Frontend Developer at ITERART and today I am working with:
about.description3: I keep learning and improving my skills.
about.description4: I like to do sports, program, music and hang out with friends.

projects.title: PROJECTS
projects.subtitle: These are some of my projects
projects.project1: MERN Stack (MySQL, Express, React, Nodejs). You can control, edit and calculate the stock of merchandise.
projects.project2: Vite app using Redux and Tailwind. You can schedule all the invoices to be organized and not forget them.
projects.project3: React app. On this website you can create your 100% professional resume. It will help you get a job.
projects.project4: Nextjs with Redux app. Find recipes from anywhere in the world. It will tell you the ingredients and how to prepare it.
projects.project5: React native app. You can find different transports to travel. It will tell you the price, duration ...
projects.project6: React Native app. Created with expo-cli, it is a replica of ShooterAim, only the programming language changes.
projects.project7: React app. Where you can improve your accuracy, reaction and reflexes in shooting games.
projects.project8: React app. Here you will find your pokemons, look at their characteristics and abilities.
